list.abs: 岩柱(hoodoos)，由风、河流里的水与冰侵蚀和湖床的沉积岩组成。红色、橙色与白色的岩石形成了奇特的自然景观，因此其被誉为天 …
图文 2、奇形岩(Hoodoos) Hoodoos来自西非的HAUSA语,本意是“复仇”,18世纪引到北美。当地的印第安人用此来表示罪恶的超自然的因素,一些甚至相信这种景观是传说中的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally US): apparently an alteration of voodoo. It originally denoted a person who practised voodoo, hence a hidden cause of bad luck (sense 1). Sense 2 is apparently due to the resemblance of the rock column to a strange human form, often topped by an overhanging ‘hat’ of harder rock

means.word_mean: 1. a column of weathered and eccentrically shaped rock;
3. a charm superstitiously believed to embody magical powers
4. something believed to bring bad luck
1. bring back luck; be a source of misfortune
